extendedData.value:
Celebrate a new set by picking up a full booster box (36 booster packs) to play Limited formats, like Booster Draft and Sealed Deck.

On Ravnica, whoever you are—soldier or scientist, merchant or spy—your guild is the core of your identity. It provides structure and greater purpose. Now, the time has come to defend it.

Contains 36 Guilds of Ravnica booster packs

results.cleanName: Guilds of Ravnica Prerelease Pack Set of 5

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
On Ravnica, whoever you are—soldier or scientist, merchant or spy—your guild is the core of your identity. It provides structure and greater purpose. Now, the time has come to defend it.

Set of 5 contains 1 Prerelease Pack from each Guild.
Each Prerelease Pack contains:
• 5 Guilds of Ravnica booster packs
• 1 Seeded booster (Matching Guilds) with 14 cards
• 1 of 5 Guild inserts
• 1 Code Card
• 1 Spindown life counter

results.name: Guilds of Ravnica - Prerelease Pack [Set of 5]

results.cleanName: Guilds of Ravnica Theme Booster Display Box

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Soldier or scientist, merchant or spy — your GRN guild is the core of your identity and now, the time has come to defend it, to prepare for the final showdown with Nicol Bolas!

This listing includes 1 factory sealed Theme booster box. 'Theme' boosters are different than normal boosters:

• Each box contains 10 jumbo packs: 2 each of the five bi-colored Ravnican Guilds booster packs:
- Selesnya GW
- Boros RW
- Golgari BG
- Izzet UR
- Dimir UB.

• Each jumbo pack has 35 random cards, with one guaranteed to be a mythic or rare, all in the colors of the Guild on the pack!
